messages.title: STANDING UP FOR OUR LOCAL COMMUNITY
messages.content: This election is our chance to help create a fairer society here in Leeds and across the country. Your vote really matters.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will introduce free prescriptions for all and free personal care for older people, and the Labour has always done, will give our NHS the money and support it needs.
Labour's Green Transformation Fund will invest in new solar, tidal and wind energy and in better-insulated homes to create hundreds of thousands of good jobs.

Labour will change that. We will invest in new infrastructure like better transport and in tackling social deprivation. We'll raise the Living Wage to Â£10 an hour and provide free school meals for all primary age children.

issues.health: Labour will introduce free prescriptions for all and free personal care for older people, and the Labour has always done, will give our NHS the money and support it needs.

housing.content: Labour's Green Transformation Fund will invest in new solar, tidal and wind energy and in better-insulated homes to create hundreds of thousands of good jobs.

leaflet.personalStatement: I see my job as standing up for you, listening to your concerns and then taking action. I have helped thousands of constituents and campaigned for Leeds to get better flood defences, improved public transport and more investment in our city. In Parliament I speak up for what I think is right, and I hope that's what you want in your MP.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helped thousands of constituents and campaigned for Leeds to get better flood defences, improved public transport and more investment in our city.

contactInformation.address: Unity Business Centre, 26 Roundhay Road, Leeds LS7 1AB

endorsements.endorsement: I'm supporting Hilary because I have seen how hard he works for people in our area. He listens, he acts and above all he fights for Leeds Central. He is a dedicated and effective MP.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet communicates the candidate's availability to help with issues by holding regular advice surgeries.
